info.author: Rojina Maharjan rmharjan@memphis.edu
info.abstract: The D3 Force Layout component produces an undirected graph of any matrix input.
info.description: The D3 Force Layout components takes a 2 dimensional matrix, and outputs a force directed graph of same. It is designed to allow visualization of LSA matrices and other sorts of undirected graph situations.
info.inputs: tab-delimited 2-dimensional association matrix with both column and row headers
info.outputs: Force directed graph representation of input matrix.
